events.text:
Day 354
Hello, little journal.
I have decided to keep you informed of my daily activities and thoughts as a way to mark the passage of time.
I just hope I can remember to write in you consistently.
In any case, today I’m going to collect more moon carrots, as I do every day.
Now that I think about it (though I’m sure I’ve thought of it before), I don’t actually know where they go after I pluck them from the ground.
This suit is frustratingly without pockets.
Who designed this thing?
They didn’t think I’d need pockets?
They’re so handy!
And fashionable.
But then again, what would I need pockets for anyway?
Aside from the disappearing carrots, what is there?
Moon rocks?
What do I need those for?
The moon bunny has no need of rocks and neither do I.
